messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Talking about death Was Re: Pre-K Play -- Disturb...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/4/2004 8:07:55 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Yep. I know what you mean. I told DH the other day it would be SOO nice to be able to tell
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/4/2004 8:07:55 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
abzb@... writes:

> I did say
> we were all energy before we were born and after but that didn't hold much
> promise for him and dropped it.
>
> Hey death sucks. What can I do but go through this with him. The hard part
> was asking him what he thoguth and then him asking again was that true and
> seeing his pain.

Yep. I know what you mean. I told DH the other day it would be SOO nice to be
able to tell him that we will all meet again in hevean and exist "happily
ever after", but we don't believe that, so I would feel like I was lying to him
just to make him less unhappy, less afraid... its tough! I would WAY rather he
needed stitches or broke an arm or something! I can deal with that pain! :~)
Very tough...

Síocháin ar domhan,
Sang


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
